capabilityDescription.en: Produces rule violations for each component (i.e. processors or controller services) of a given type.
capabilityDescription.zh: Produces rule violations for each component (i.e. processors or controller services) of a given type.

en.description: Components of the given type will produce a rule violation (i.e. they shouldn't exist). Either the simple or the fully qualified name of the type should be provided.

zh.description: Components of the given type will produce a rule violation (i.e. they shouldn't exist). Either the simple or the fully qualified name of the type should be provided.
